rukus.text: By the fig and the olive
Surely We have created human of the best stature as the perfect pattern of creation
Then We have reduced him to the lowest of the low
Except those who believe and do good, righteous deeds, so there is for them a reward constant and beyond measure
What, then, (O human,) causes you, after all (these realities), to deny the Last Judgment
Is not God the Best of judges and the Most Powerful of sovereigns
